posts.description: Can Teaching Young Women to DJ and Produce Solve Gender Inequality in Electronic Music? | Thump
posts.extended: At the Lower Eastside Girls Club, an organization that provides educational programs to lower-income young women in New York City, class is ending. "Get ready for DJ Stacia!" someone yells. The room erupts in cheers.

The benefits of mindfulness meditation, increasingly popular in recent years, are supposed to be many: reduced stress and risk for various diseases, improved well-being, a rewired brain. But the experimental bases to support these claims have been few.

posts.description: Should ‘Scalia’ became the universal BDSM safeword? | Fusion
posts.extended: Hours before a taping of the podcast Savage Love, news broke that Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia had passed away at the age of 79.
